totem is not working it says it needs ne: do you have the universe and multiverse repositories enabled in Synaptic Package Manager?
no worries.  In the top panel, click on System, then Administration, then Synaptic Package Manager.  Let me know when you have it opened.
be sure to prefix responses with my name, billy.  Click on "Settings", then "Repositories."
be sure that all of the repositories have a check mark beside them.
OK.  Close Synaptic and open a terminal.  Applications > Accessories > Terminal
copy/paste this into the terminal `sudo wget http://download.videolan.org/pub/libdvdcss2.9-1_i386.deb`.
you copy/pasted that into a terminal right?
did that one come back OK?
sudo apt-get install libdvdnav4 libdvdplay0 libdvdread3
if that one comes back error, do this one > sudo /usr/share/doc/libdvdread3/install-css.sh
the second one came back error?
yeah, there's a difference in the directories.  do this now > sudo apt-get install totem-xine
you should be able to watch DVD's now.
